first_translate: lady fiona...
I believe that if we were together,

hangle: 분명 더 나은 미래를 꿈꿀 수 있을 겁니다.
first_translate: we could dream  of a better future for ourselves.

hangle: 뭐, 연서를 받는 건 나름 신선한 경험이기는 했지.
first_translate: well... I suppose receiving love letters is quite new to me.

hangle: 하지만 난 이미 연인이 있고, 모르는 상대에게 설렐 이유도 없다.
first_translate: but I already have someone special, so there’s no reason why I would feel anything toward you.
my lord, let me tell you this beforehand.

hangle: 답장을 드리지 않았던 것이 곧 거절의 뜻이었습니다.
first_translate: the fact that I didn’t reply was my way of saying “no.”
I know.

hangle: 하지만 한 번 더 긴밀한 이야기를 나누고 싶어서요.
first_translate: but I wanted us to talk more about it one last time.
let's hope our conversation doesn't test my patience too much.
let's hope our conversation doesn't test my patience too much.
alright then, what do you want from me?

hangle: 저는 영애에 대해 아주 잘 알고 있습니다.
first_translate: I know everything about you, lady fiona.
and I can assure you...
...that the information I possess on you...
...differs greatly from what others think they know.
if we work together, both you and I will be able to achieve far greater things than ever before.

hangle: 지금보다 훨씬 더 많은 것들을 할 수 있을 거라고 생각합니다.
first_translate: if we work together, both you and I will be able to achieve far greater things than ever before.
as I mentioned in my letter,

hangle: 저는 영애께서 지혜로운 선택을 하시리라 믿겠습니다.
first_translate: I trust that you’ll make a wise decision regarding this matter.
honestly,

hangle: 별로 휩쓸리고 싶지 않은 유형의 인간이다.
first_translate: this isn’t exactly the kind of person I’d like to get involved with.

hangle: 제가 아는 것이 무엇인지는 저와 함께 가시면 알려 드리죠.
first_translate: I'll only reveal what I know once you decide to join forces with me.
secrets about myself? well...

hangle: 걸리는 것들이 많긴 하지만 이런 말에 일일이 동요할 수는 없지.
first_translate: it bothers me somewhat, but I won’t fall into his trap by reacting emotionally.
not only am I not interested, but I also don’t need your help.
may I leave now?
that’s unfortunate. at least take this as a token of goodwill.
it’s an invitation.

hangle: 받아 두셔서 나쁠 건 없을 겁니다.
first_translate: taking it wouldn’t hurt anyone.
give it some thought.

hangle: 적어도 지금 곁에 붙어 계신 황자 전하보다
first_translate: at any rate, I’m definitely worthier than prince bernhart,

hangle: 분명 제가 훨씬 가치 있을 테니까요.
first_translate: don’t you agree?
now that you mention him, I’ve changed my mind.
so does that mean you’re going--
count bill curtis.
do you really think you deserve to say such words?

hangle: 그게 그 입으로 뱉는 것이 가능한 말이라고 생각하시나요?
first_translate: do you really think you deserve to say such words?

hangle: 한 번만 더 황자 전하에 대해서 가치를 운운하신다면,
first_translate: if you dare speak ill of his highness again,
I promise you that I won’t just sit back quietly next time around.
how dare he!
how dare he!
he certainly wasn’t pleasant company, was he?
that man...
no, indeed.

hangle: 영애가 왜 그리 적대적으로 나오셨는지 이제 알 것 같아요.
first_translate: I finally understand why you acted so hostilely towards him earlier.

hangle: 뭐, 제가 그를 싫어하는 건… 단순히 행동의 문제가 아니라,
first_translate: to be honest, I dislike him because it has nothing to do with how he acts or behaves.

hangle: 사교계에 새로운 파벌을 만들고 있기 때문이지만요.
first_translate: rather, it’s due to the fact that he’s trying to create another faction within high society.
a faction?

hangle: 네, 듣자 하니 무언가 비밀 클럽을 운영해서 귀족들을 부르고 있더군요.
first_translate: yes. apparently, he runs something similar to a secret club where nobles are invited.
from what I heard, it sounds rather suspicious.
then...
is that an invitation to his club?
apparently, he makes all sorts of claims.

hangle: 자기가 마물을 조종하는 방법을 알고 있다거나,
first_translate: for instance, he says he knows ways to control monsters...

hangle: 어둠에 당한 이들을 구원할 수 있다는 이야기죠.
first_translate: ...and save those who fell victim to darkness.

hangle: 황궁 마법사와 성녀들조차 해내지 못했던 일들이니
first_translate: of course, none of these statements hold truth since even royal mages and saints couldn’t accomplish them.
of course, none of these statements hold truth since even royal mages and saints couldn’t accomplish them.
victims of darkness...
monsters...?
surprisingly enough, many aristocrats seem to support him.
although personally speaking, I despise him.
what if I told you that starting today, I hate him too?
in that case, we share common ground.
so...
fiona got drunk tonight...
...because she had trouble dealing with another guy?
completely hammered
like I said,

hangle: 영 별로인 남자를 만나서 영애의 기분이 상하셨거든요.
first_translate: she met a terrible man who ruined her mood.
who might that be?
what happened?
well...

hangle: 그건 영애께 직접 물어보시는 게 어떨까요?
first_translate: why don’t you ask her yourself?

hangle: 아, 하지만 그렇게 술에 취한 건 황자 전하 때문이에요.
first_translate: oh, but getting completely wasted was thanks to you, your highness.
what...?
me?! why?
well...
you should probably ask her directly.
she truly is strange.

hangle: 피오나가 그 여자와 놀지 않았으면 좋겠는데….
first_translate: I wish fiona wouldn’t hang out with her anymore...

hangle: 마음에 들어 하니까 어쩔 수 없나.
first_translate: but seeing how fond she seems to be of her, I guess there’s nothing else I can do.
where did you go off to?
thanks to you, I still have a pounding headache.
even though you’re currently dating someone right now,
you must marry me.
after all, you belong to me!
